Simple Project Documentation¶

Welcome to the Simple Sphinx-Needs Demo documentation.

Project: A small Python app to add and subtract numbers.

Requirements¶

Requirement: Add numbers correctly REQ_001
status: open
tags: math, addition
author: Ganesh
links incoming: SPEC_001

The program should return the correct sum of two numbers.
Requirement: Subtract numbers correctly REQ_002
status: open
tags: math, subtraction
author: Ganesh
links incoming: SPEC_002

The program should return the correct difference of two numbers.

Specifications¶

Specification: Addition function SPEC_001
status: in_progress
links outgoing: REQ_001
links incoming: TEST_001

Implement function add(a, b) in Python.
Specification: Subtraction function SPEC_002
status: in_progress
links outgoing: REQ_002
links incoming: TEST_002

Implement function subtract(a, b) in Python.

Test Cases¶

Test Case: Test addition TEST_001
status: not_tested
links outgoing: SPEC_001

Ensure add(2,3) == 5.
Test Case: Test subtraction TEST_002
status: not_tested
links outgoing: SPEC_002

Ensure subtract(5,3) == 2.
